pages.text: The Pressing Machine is a Block that is Powered by Redstone, which is used to Press Items into a Other Ones, such as Ingots into Weapon Mod Tokens. The Items can be Added to the Block via Hopper. Placing one Ynderneath It will Withdraw non-input Items. You must right-click the Block Once every Time the World is Loaded to Activate it.
The Recipe contains Cobblestone, a Piston and a Redstone torch
